thread.title: Torbjorn Jansson

author: Torbjorn Jansson
title: Torbjorn Jansson
text:
Still waitning for your answer of this e.mail:
Dear mr Carl Schwiring!.
Now I have booked a car at Sixt in Khon Kaen on 18 of February. Booking nr 383450086. I couldn´t find anywhere to tell the booking nr from last time to redeem my discount as you promise in your e-mail . what to do?
Kindest regards and a nice weekend!
Refagards
Torbjörn Jansson
